Announcement

![Card image cap](https://ekonvo.utm.my/argon/img/brand/mortar_konvo.jpg)

### UTM iCONVO SYSTEM (Starting MK64)

Attendance Verification to Convocation Ceremony and Certificate Collection.  
Forgot Password? [Click Here](https://ekonvo.utm.my/password/reset)

[First Time Login](https://ekonvo.utm.my/register)
 [Login iConvo](https://ekonvo.utm.my/login)

![Card image cap](https://ekonvo.utm.my/argon/img/acad/konvo_4.jpg)

### GRADUATE STATUS MK68

  

Please click here to confirm your graduate status.

Verify Here

### SISTEM KAJIAN PENGESANAN GRADUAN

[More Details](https://graduan.mohe.gov.my/SKPG2023/)
